the_Manor

Class EnigmaticDoor

  • java.lang.Object
    • the_Manor.Door
      • the_Manor.EnigmaticDoor

  • public class EnigmaticDoor
extends Door
    This EnigmaticDoor class stands for a door that is locked by an enigma.
    This enigma can be solved if the player propose the right solution.
    Version:
    22/11/2016
    Author:
    Simon Hay

      • EnigmaticDoor

        public EnigmaticDoor(java.lang.String enigma,
                     java.lang.String response,
                     Room nextRoom)
        Constructor of the class EnigmaticDoor.
        Parameters:
        enigma - The enigma that has to be solved to pass the door
        response - The response of the enigma
        nextRoom - The next room the player is going to enter after having solved the enigma

    • Method Detail

      • solveEnigma

        public void solveEnigma(java.lang.String responseOfThePlayer)
        This method allows the player to propose an answer to the enigma that keep the door locked.
        Parameters:
        responseOfThePlayer - The response the player is proposing

      • isLocked

        public boolean isLocked()
        Function to know if the door is locked
        Returns:
        A boolean to know if the door is locked or not (true => locked; false => open)
